Issue.creator: sambhavdutt
Issue.summary: TestNewGossipStateProvider_BatchingOfStateRequest failed in gossip as foobar validation failed and peer was not accessible
Issue.description: ERRO 008 Validation failed: foobar 20:31:01 2019-06-04 00:30:15.535 UTC gossip.gossip#p0 NewGossipService -> WARN 01b External endpoint is empty, peer will not be accessible outside of its organization . 20:31:02 2019-06-04 00:30:47.201 UTC gossip.comm sendToEndpoint -> WARN 1e19 Failed obtaining connection for 127.0.0.1:43431, PKIid:3132372e302e302e313a3433343331 reason: ConnStore is closing 20:31:02 --- FAIL: TestNewGossipStateProvider_BatchingOfStateRequest (31.31s) 20:31:02 state_test.go:1656: Started to spin off, until predicate will be satisfied. {code} *Build Log* https://logs.hyperledger.org/production/vex-yul-hyp-jenkins-3/fabric-unit-test-coverage-daily-master-x86_64/449/ >
